import React, { Component } from "react"; import { FormattedMessage } from "react-intl"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { getAllCodeServiece } from "../../../services/userService"; class UserRedux extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { genderArr: [] } } async componentDidMount() { try{ let res = await getAllCodeServiece('gender'); if(res && res.errCode === 0 ){ this.setState({ genderArr }) } console.log('thudb check res: ', res) }catch(e){ console.log(e) } } //router quản lý user redux render() { return (
Minh đẹp trai có nhiều em ghệ đích bự
); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return {}; }; const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return {}; }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(UserRedux);
